name: MY LOVE STORIES ODIN ENG
description:
DISCOVER A NEW INTERACTIVE STORY

********************************************************************************

Links to the downloads can be found at the bottom of the page

Version Française du jeu (French version)
 => https://lessdessdouxstudio.itch.io/my-love-stories-odin <=

********************************************************************************

SYNOPSIS

Live your own adventure of love through exciting and flamboyant stories in Visual Novel form, thanks to your choices and determination ! 

Discover Odin, a man as charming as he is mysterious.
Will you succeed in conquering his heart before it's too late ? 

Discover fabulous new characters but watch your back !

Your rivals are standing behind you ! 

For even more fun, there are bonus stories ! 

Love, Adventure, Magic, Enchantment, Mysticism, this is what awaits you through My Love Stories Odin.

********************************************************************************
